revision.text:
'''Eggs''' are items that contain Pokémon. Eggs can be obtained in 2 ways: Buy from a shop or breed a level 100 Pokémon. Getting the egg through the latter method will boost the egged Pokémon's attack by 25% of its base attack. == Shop Egg Pool == '''Kanto''' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Fire !! Grass !! Water !! Electric !! Fighting !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | Charmander || Bulbasaur || Squirtle || Magnemite || Hitmonchan || Dratini |- | Growlithe || Oddish || Lapras || Pikachu || Hitmonlee || Dragonair |- | Ponyta || Bellsprout || Staryu || Voltorb || Machop || Dragonite |- | Vulpix || Tangela || Psyduck || Electabuzz || Mankey || |} '''Johto''' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Fire !! Grass !! Water !! Electric !! Fighting !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | Cyndaquil || Chickorita || Totodile || Chinchou || Tyrogue || |- | Slugma || Hoppip || Wooper || Mareep || || |- | Houndour || Sunkern || Marill || Elekid || || |- | Magby || || Qwilfish || || || |} {{Eggs}}
